mapper.select: select * from morechoice where more_text = #{text} and source_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into morechoice (more_id, more_text, more_A, more_B, more_C, more_D, more_E, more_F, more_answer, more_parse, more_level, source_id) values (#{moreId}, #{moreText}, #{moreA}, #{moreB}, #{moreC}, #{moreD}, #{moreE}, #{moreF}, #{moreAnswer}, #{moreParse}, #{moreLevel}, #{sourceId})
